Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st Langley
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temp rrtd via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 133rd Place, 134th Street and Indiana, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near 131st Langley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Broadway/Cullom
ShortDescription: Southbound 36 Broadway buses are temp rerouted via  Broadway, Sheridan and Irving Park then resume normal route, due to street blockage near Broadway/Cullom.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via  Broadway, Sheridan and Irving Park then resume normal route, due to street blockage near Broadway/Cullom.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/California
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Western, 63rd, due to street blockage near 59th/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 59th, Western, 63rd and then resume their normal route on 59th, due to street blockage near 59th/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Skokie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier signal problem near Skokie.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
